comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Elizabeth Carman was the 9-year-old daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Edwin Carman; she testified in the 1914 inquest into the death of Lulu Bailey, which took place in the Carmans' home, and for which Mrs. Carman was to stand trial.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The Carman house (murder scene) and other photos connected with the Carman drama:

comment._content: Retired at last, Wystan and pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for the additional information about this image. We will add some of it to the description when we update.
